help-file.title: "ANTI-PALADIN" "ANTI PALADIN" "ANTIPALADIN"
help-file.content:
Anti-Paladins are evil knights that have fallen from grace and now serve the darker powers of the world as a result. They, like their good-aligned analogs the Paladins, are hearty Fighters that possess limited spell-like powers. These powers are granted to them by their evil deities and are used to further advance their vile causes.
Anti-Paladins are the best horsemen in the world. At higher levels, Anti- Paladins receive many powers, primarily offensive in nature, and can harm opponents with a touch.
Allowable races: Orc, Githyanki, Death Knight, Vampire. Innate Abilities: Summon Mount, Detect Evil, Detect Good, Vampiric Touch Equipment Usage: Like all classes on Duris, Anti-Paladins have their own set of equipment they can use. Anti-Paladins can use most weapons and armor, but are rather limited in their use of magic items.
